title: Bug in ezBoard?
content:
Has anyone else problems replying to topics?
For some reason I have, and the board doesn't show my existence! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

I wonder how this topic works out.. Hopefully you can see it.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Bug in ezBoard?
content:
Seems that the topic appeared. Let's see how this reply here works. Check out my profile and there the recent posts -- and see for youself; there reads I've posted at them, but you can't see my posts there. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Really strange, hopefully it gets fixed soon.

Edit: Hmmm, now this reply can be seen here, but in the main topic selection you can't see my name as the latest poster. :\ Here's the error message:
[pre] Request Error - Message not understood: #messageIDAn error has occurred executing your request.Message not understood: #messageIDIf you feel you may have information which would be helpful in determining the cause of this problem, please post a bug report here at the ezboard bugs help forum: Report Request Errors!Stack backtrace:BBSMessage(Object)>>doesNotUnderstand:optimized [] in BBSTopicMessage>>handleAt:OrderedCollection>>detect:ifNone:BBSTopicMessage>>handleAt:BBSTopicMessage(BBSAbstractMessage)>>addReply:toMessage<!--EZCODE EMOTICON START --><img src=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif ALT=":p"><!--EZCODE EMOTICON END--> osterEmail:withData:BBSForum>>addReplyFromData:BBSForum>>addMessageFromWeb:using:BBSForum>>addReplyFromWeb:optimized [] in WebLocalNamedObjectReference>>runWebRequest:useMethod:Error class(GenericException class)>>handle:do:EzBWebObjectReference(WebLocalNamedObjectReference)>>runWebRequest:useMethod:EzBWebObjectReference(WebNamedObjectReference)>>runWebRequest:WebRequest>>dispatchRequestWebRequest>>runRequestFromServer:WebRequestHandler>>handleRequestoptimized [] in WebServer>>handleClient:BlockClosure>>on:do:optimized [] in Process class>>forBlock<!--EZCODE EMOTICON START --><img src=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif ALT=":p"><!--EZCODE EMOTICON END--> riority:[/pre]You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
